page.title: 20The Future,Marchwood
page.content: {Marchwood is growing rapidly.}Many new housing estates are already planned.A new shopping precinct is being built in the centre of the village, and a new village hall and sports centre are planned as well.Old peoples' bungalows are to be built close to the new Community school.Ironically the village's oldest building, Malthouse Farm,over 250 years old, is being converted into a doctor's surgery. The area is obviously in for many changes in the future. ................. This study on the Marchwood area was completed by members of classes 12C and 12D, of Abbotswood Middle School,Totton, Hampshire in July 1985. We would like to thank the numerous people in the Marchwood area who helped us.
